participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, he enjoys pushing boundaries and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and thrill-seeking, he embodies the spirit of skate culture.
participant_2.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.
